query.name: Find genes regulated by protein
query.description: Find genes that are regulated by the TF protein.

query.name: Find proteins regulating gene
query.description: Find proteins that are regulating a specific gene.

query.name: Find entities involved in disease
query.description: Find proteins or genes involved in diseases matching the search term.

query.name: All relations from a node
query.description: Search for relations from node A

query.name: Find proteins participating in the same process
query.description: Find proteins participating in the same process as the query protein.

query.name: Count protein interactions
query.description: Returns the number of interactions for each protein.
